body.p: As mentioned in,‚Äù T1/E1 framer supports E1 mode by default. For T1 mode configuration, input clock to framer needs to be changed to 1.544 MHz.
For changing framer input clock to 1.544 MHz, following changes need to be done:

ul.li: Top side: Make R137 as NU and mount R133

p.b: Figure 22. T1_E1 Clock Mode Change Top Side
